title: The Great Vowel Shift, or A Brief History of English
itunes:title: The Great Vowel Shift, or A Brief History of English
description:
Language is alive. It shifts and changes; pronunciations and spellings morph throughout time. English is no exception.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
